title: Queue pops but client only shows up half the time
body: So I'm not sure if this is happening to anyone else but since installing the most recent patch (6.16) whenever I try to enter a game, my queue will pop after a few minutes but half the time i'll only hear the noise and my client won't pop up on the computer screen and I have to manually click on the LoL icon myself to accept. Not sure if this is just a weird bug only happening to me but I thought I'd share?

replies.body: When you join queue and accept a match, the server needs to group everyone together and drop them into the same server.  It seems that you might have a network issue that's leaving you behind.  Your best bet would be to go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and follow each step to troubleshoot this.  Let me know if you still have any issues!
